skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

effects.description:
Passive Ability: "Onwards, Sons of the Empire", while this Mount is equipped, for Melee Cavalry units
	(all units in army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Gelt has appeared on many battlefields soaring overhead on his pegasus.

effects.description:
Passive Ability: "No Pity, No Remorse", while this Mount is equipped, for Outrider, Pistolier, War Wagon, and Demigryph units
	(all units in army)

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: By increasing the density of the shot stockpiles with which his army travels, the guns of the Empire rain devastation down upon their foes.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +8% for Gunnery Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The infantry under his command gain renewed courage as their blades are reinforced by the Winds of Chamon.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +8% for Melee Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This Lord belts out orders and can be heard even across a battlefield smothered in the grim noise of war.
Those who bear the Mark of Hysh are practitioners of the magical Lore of Light, and the bane of Chaos, for they are able to control and manipulate the White Wind of Magic.
The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: By simply being near, the Gold Wizard hardens allied armour as if it had been tempered by the most gifted blacksmiths.
In his younger years Balthasar showed great promise when it came to understanding the medicinal properties of minerals and herbs.

effects.description:
Chance of a plague spreading: -20%
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: What ingenious technological advance is this, that affords Imperial artillerists more and better ammunition with which to smite Karl Franz's enemies?

effects.description:
Explosive missile damage +10% for Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(all armies)

Missile explosion radius: +20% for Helstorm Rocket Battery units
	(all armies)

skillTree.localised_description: Gelt's mask of gold both covers up the results of the explosion that almost ended his life and affords considerable protection to its wearer in battle.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Possessed of a fierce intelligence and remarkable magical skills, the youngest Wizard ever to become Patriarch of the Gold College is known - and feared - throughout the land.

skillTree.localised_description: No one is more accomplished in the Lore of Metal than the golden-masked Gelt.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: “We march to war for our Emperor, and Sigmar, our saviour and lord.”

skillTree.localised_description: These steeds are bred for speed and war, but foremost it is their gallop which marks them out.

skillTree.localised_description: The frontline will either make or break you. Those who survive become the backbone of any army.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
Revered by the masses, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.
The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
It is said that Sigmar would bear a mortal wound and carry on fighting; this champion follows the hallowed Warrior-God.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: "Ever thought about joining the Elector's troops, chief? You'd make a good soldier alright."

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

factionEffects.localised_description: Balthasar Gelt is the Supreme Patriarch of the Colleges of Magic. He has only ever been seen swathed in shimmering, metallic robes and wearing a golden mask.

effects.description: Has access to the Colleges of Magic, enabling the recruitment of Wizards and special campaign actions
